issue.title: [CF 680] Menus can run offscreen
issue.body:
What steps will reproduce the problem?
1. Have too danged many groups or icons.
2. Work on a computer with a limited size screen.
3.

What do you expect to happen? What happens instead?
I messed up an important group in my profile by mistake. I was unable to restore it because I have a large number of groups in that profile and the flyout menu list extended off the top of my screen.

What version of TellMeWhen are you using? ("The latest" is not a version)
r631


> Posted by CurseForge user solitha | Imported from CurseForge issue #680 | Raw

comments.body:
Fixed in r643


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
